title: OnChain Industries 2.0
description: OnChain Industries is a Real-time Open-source Intelligence (OSINT) platform for Web3. Search any email address, username or various cryptocurrency wallet addresses, and discover associated Web3 accounts with advanced information-gathering techniques. Pivot your investigations, discover profiles on popular Web3 and Decentralised social media apps, DeFi games or NFT marketplaces. Either use our web platform, or connect your tool directly to our Web3 OSINT API.
